name: Balls Cup
description:
Balls Cup is super fun and plays for hours at a time!

Aim at breaking all bricks by one shoot: Swipe your finger and throw balls,Make them roll among the bricks.
Hit items to make extra balls.Prevent the bricks to reach the check-line!

Features:
◉ Perfect design,Full of bouncy.
◉ Fully automatic progress save
◉ Endless game mode
◉ Tablet support
◉ Global Leaderboards

Balls Cup is Suit for all age and completely FREE to play!
Now play and become the Champions League champion!
